Select Workfile Location

Use the Select Workfile Location dialog box (Actions | Check Out | Check Out To browse button) to check out a revision to a temporary location (other than the workfile location set for the versioned file). The location you specify is in effect only for the items you are checking out; after you click OK, the workfile location returns to the location specified for the items.

Field Descriptions

Look in Select a valid drive or path where you would like to check out workfiles. The contents of the drive or path you select appear in the contents list.
Contents list Double-click to select a directory that will contain the checked out workfiles. This contents list displays the directories in the drive or folder selected in the Look in field. Selecting a directory updates the Look in and Folder name fields to reflect the full path name of the new location.
Opens the directory one level above the current level. This button is disabled if you are at the top level of a directory.
Creates a new folder in the currently selected directory. You may rename the new folder using in-place editing. The following characters are not allowed in new folder names: \ / : * ? " < > | .
Folder name Use the Look in and Contents list fields to select and display a folder name or enter a path to the directory where you want to check out the workfiles.
